alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 8:08PM CDT until July 05 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Fayette County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 807 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Nashua to 7 miles south of Shell Rock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Maynard around 855 PM CDT. Fayette around 900 PM CDT. Arlington around 910 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Highway 93 And County W 14, Highway 93 And County V 68, Volga River State Park, Wadena, Randalia, Highways 3 And 187 and County Road W 45 And 187. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
